mapper.select: select pn_order.order_number,pn_order.order_time,pn_order.consignee,pn_order.consignee_phone,pn_order.order_money, pn_order.order_amount,pn_order_status.order_sts,pn_save_way.save_way,pn_show.show_name,pn_show.show_begin_time, pn_show.show_money,pn_show_place.show_place from pn_order left join pn_order_status on pn_order.order_status_id =pn_order_status.order_status_id left join pn_save_way on pn_save_way.save_way_id=pn_order.save_way_id left join pn_show on pn_show.show_id=pn_order.show_id left join pn_show_place on pn_show_place.show_place_id= pn_show.show_place_id WHERE pn_order.order_number=#{order_number}
SELECT * FROM pn_discount WHERE user_id=#{user_id} and show_type_id=#{show_type_id} and discount_status_id=1;

SELECT pn_address.address_name,pn_address.address_phone,pn_address.address_street,pn_area.area from pn_address LEFT JOIN pn_area on pn_address.area_id=pn_area.area_id WHERE pn_address.user_id=#{user_id}
